metadata.title: CVE-2019-19308 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In text_to_glyphs in sushi-font-widget.c in gnome-font-viewer 3.34.0, thereis a NULL pointer dereference while parsing a TTF font file that lacks aname section (due to a g_strconcat call that returns NULL).

criterions.comment: gnome-font-viewer package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gnome-sushi package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
